class_notes: Must seek permission from faculty to enroll. The Office of Education will process the registration.
course_description: This elective course provides opportunities for students to enhance their understanding of the multiple specialty roles of pediatric nursing in the acute and ambulatory settings. Quality and safety, patient- and family-centered care and evidence based practice are emphasized.
prerequisites: NRSG 327 and NRSG 328 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 3851, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Weston, Status: Open
